channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Automating VMware to Hyper-V Migration with SCVMM
item.description:
Hello everyone! Today we have a guest author, Cameron Peppers, who is a Cloud Solution Architect working with our On-Prem VMWare Migration program/field team. He has a long background that is focused on Hyper-V and SCVMM datacenter design, along with migrations from VMware for more years that he can cares to admit.
This blog post provides a PowerShell script for automating the migration of a virtual machine (VM) from most versions of VMware to Hyper-V using SCVMM 2022 UR2+ or 2025 and retaining all settings (yes, even the static IP!). With 10GB or better Layer 2 networking and flash storag...
